FolderStructure.title: Src folder structure
FolderStructure.whyThisWay: I wanted to make sure to find all my components and pages easily.

FolderStructure.title: Test folder structure
FolderStructure.whyThisWay:
Test files are not the same as src files so I want to seperate them.
The same structure appears in both because I want to easily find the tested file.

CodeStructure.title: Object structure
CodeStructure.whyThisWay:
Each object does 1 task only.
This leads to more objects but I specifically what purpose it has in the codebase.

TestCodeStructure.title: Test code structure
TestCodeStructure.whyThisWay:
I want to mock all dependencies out, returning fake elements.
This is done to speed up the tests and to be sure that any errors are present in the tested code only.

Test files are not the same as src files so I want to seperate them.

CodeStructure.title: Class structure
CodeStructure.whyThisWay:
Each class does 1 task only.
This leads to more classes but I specifically what purpose it has in the codebase.

CodeStructure.title: Class structure (Processor)
CodeStructure.whyThisWay: This class orchestrates the flow of the codebase with dependencies (classes) added in the constructor.

CodeStructure.title: Interface structure
CodeStructure.whyThisWay: I want to make sure all the classes that are common, implement these methods

CodeStructure.title: Controller structure
CodeStructure.whyThisWay:
Each class does 1 task only.
This leads to more classes but I specifically what purpose it has in the codebase.

CSharp.testCodeHeader:
Each test is broken into sections to visually see where everything is.
I need to test every code path instead of just the happy path because errors and other unexpected things happen

TestCodeStructure.title: Controller test code structure
TestCodeStructure.whyThisWay: I want to mock all dependencies out, returning fake elements. This is done to speed up the tests and to be sure that any errors are present in the tested code only.

TestCodeStructure.title: Processor test code structure
TestCodeStructure.whyThisWay: I want to mock all dependencies out, returning fake elements. This is done to speed up the tests and to be sure that any errors are present in the tested code only.
